website_summaries.verdict: Exactly what you would expect from a long-handled spoon. The classic, comfortable design will make these your go-to spoons.
pros: Smooth, finished edges make spoons comfortable to hold and safe to put in your mouth
Weight of spoon is well balanced
Traditional bowl end of spoon gets the perfect sized bite of ice cream
cons: Compared to other similar sets, this one sits at a slightly higher price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spoons, very reasonable price. Will order more.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality; The perfect shine is protected by individual wrappers for each spoon and sleeves that hold three each. Nice, heavy quality spoons. I expect these to last. Purchased to use as condiment spoons at a soup kitchen; I have no doubt these will stand up to the task. Hard to believe they are so reasonable in price.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, value for elegant and sturdy iced tea spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because we drink a LOT of iced tea, and the grandkids eat a LOT of iced cream sundaes. I was also trying to match a set of recently purchased flatware that I absolutely love. The 18/8 stainless steel is very high quality. The spoons are delicate, yet sturdy with a good heft in the hand. They have been through the dishwasher maybe 20 times and still gleam like brand new. I'm not the best at doing dishes right away, and sometimes just rinse and leave in the sink until the next night. Other flatware tends to rust a bit in this situation, but not these spoons. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: M. Addison

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with quality and weight.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Super heavy-duty flatware with no sharp edges. Perfect for eating malts, smoothies, or anything out of a tall glass or bowl. Polished to a mirror shine, like the description says. After getting a sub-par set of long iced tea spoons (different manufacturer and brand) several years ago that had sharp edges and a dull finish, I was reluctant to shell out the money for another relatively inexpensive set. I got my money's worth and then some with these. I will probably buy a second set, as both my boyfriend and I use these extra long spoons frequently. They're just fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin351

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: These are just about perfect: Plenty long overall, with a smallish spoon bowl. They are not so thin as to be easily bent, but not so thick as to be crude or clumsy looking. The handle is not too flat, but not too round. They are smooth and easily cleaned. The appearance is simple, but graceful and tapering. I wanted a spoon like this for eating ice cream slowly out of a deep glass, or for just eating yogurt in smaller spoonfuls instead of gulping it down. Although slightly more expensive than some others, I'm very pleased with these; they seem like a fun addition to our "silverware" drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzbean

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons! We use them for fruit sorbet, line a sundae spoon. They have a nice substantial weight to them and go through the dishwasher beautifully. I’m actually going to order a second set.
customer_reviews.author: M3isme

customer_reviews.title: These are beautifully polished and are quite weighted making them feel substantial
customer_reviews.text: I have always been partial to long-handled teaspoons. These are beautifully polished and are quite weighted making them feel substantial. A lovely find.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Good long handled spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are great long handled teaspoons but took a star off because the spoon itself is actually smaller than I thought. My old ones were the typical teaspoon size but with long handles. These have the long handles but the spoon is smaller. Probably my fault if it states that and I missed it. These are great for what they're made for though. I just like to also eat with them and wouldn't want to do that with these.
customer_reviews.author: RRHoop

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Looked long and hard for a good set of spoons like this lol. Was about to order a different brand and saw someone’s review saying he tried a bunch of different ones and said these are the best he tried. So I took his word for it and these spoons are pretty heavy and solid. Def recommended
customer_reviews.author: Deez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, heavy duty spoons. They're perfect for iced tea and ice cream sodas. Good finish, nice weight. Sometimes long iced tea spoons are flimsy or oddly balanced, these are good in both respects. We've only just started using them, so I cannot yet speak to their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excedded my expections
customer_reviews.text: I like nice sturdy/heavy silverware. I ordered these because I thought they might be nice. I didn't expect for them to be this nice (they are even nicely polished all over) I will definitely keep this seller/brand in mind. Fast delivery too. I,m adding a little note after using these spoons for a while; because the handles are heavy and tapered narrower at the scoop end, they don't fall off of what I set them on (they stay balanced).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Very small spoon.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly solid stainless steel, with the hardness stamped on each spoon. Spoons have a good heft & shine. I was raised a food snob, by a chef in a fairly affluent neighborhood & I would definitely be unashamed to serve with these spoons. As some others noted, the spoon is shallow and small in diameter. I’m glad that I bought them - great for root beer floats & a solid value, but I’m still searching for something this long, but with a larger spoon, like teaspoon size or larger. I became accustomed to these while married to a Korean woman.
customer_reviews.author: Old guy

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: LOVE them... I absolutely love the length and smoothness and sleek look of these spoons, perfect ice cream spoons, and great for getting coffee from the container, not to mention great for stirring drinks in tall glasses... very good product, very beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFrost

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. They are very sturdy and evenly weighted. Love the length they are long enough for tall travel mugs. I have not used them in the dishwasher yet however I did place them in the utensil basket to make sure they don't fall thru and they don't. Hopefully they hold up and don't rust. I will updated my review after a few weeks of use. Very hopeful and at this point very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Sharee

customer_reviews.title: Review of long handled spoons
customer_reviews.text: I luv these spoons. They are very sturdy and good quality. I originally bought these to eat my overnight oats. Most spoons are too short the mason jars for the overnight oats, and you end up getting the overnight oats all over your hands, fingers and spoon. These spoons are the perfect length, size and portion ration.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Hefty, sleek, balanced durable and easy to clean spoons
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for durable, thick and balanced spoons and this is exactly what I found. We love using ice-tea spoons because we use jars of tea and other deep receptacles. After buying a few other disappointing ones I decided to buy these because they were highly recommended - I WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED! The spoons clean easy, feel great in the hand, have heft to them, are balanced well and feel great during use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashi Fachler

customer_reviews.title: work fine
customer_reviews.text: These long spoons work well for stirring tall drinks. They look plain and nothing fancy looking about them. I got these for our home bar and they do the job. They are very sturdy to use and stir drinks nicely. made of good quality stainless steel is a plus. If you plan to entertain guest I would suggest a spoon with more fancy or elegant design.
customer_reviews.author: supermex

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons am reordering ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love it when you get the best product on the first try. Everyone prefers them for even everyday use. You have to be fast to secure yours first! Strong, and just the right size for smoothies as well as helping the grandkids to avoid overstuffing their mouths. My favorite use makes good tasting foods and meals last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin E Hodson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed, well built, versatile
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are sturdy yet with an elegant finish and form; they seem quite in place when laid with our stainless steel tableware. We use these spoons to finish off smoothies that don't go entirely through the straw, for getting edibles from the bottom of tall jars, and for that quick, long reach to sample someone else's dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Jens Zorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: I got this set of spoons for - what else? - stirring, and they're very nice. Just the length I needed, and very smooth. They seem pretty strong, too, although I haven't tried them on really hard ice cream. But I really like them, and I think they're a good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie D. Silva

customer_reviews.title: I think I've found my perfect spoons.
customer_reviews.text: My main criteria for choosing the spoons were: 1) No rough edges. 2) Being able to eat B&J icecream w/o the spoon bending like a magic-show prop. These exceeded all of my expectations. They are surprisingly well-made for the price, perfectly smooth and sturdy as a shovel. The bowl is a bit smaller than what it seems on the pictures, but that's probably a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kirichenko

customer_reviews.title: Nice ice tea spoons!
customer_reviews.text: We like these! They aren’t quite like the only remaining ice tea spoon we have from family—about 50 years old. But that isn’t a bad thing! Nice weight—substantial—and good looking. They are just too thick in the handle to open the cat food. The coffee scoop, however, does just fine. :)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Brudvig

customer_reviews.title: The Spoon size was too small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these, the spoon head was too small for what I was looking to use it for. But they are good for soda fountain drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kailua Girl

customer_reviews.title: The Best you can get
customer_reviews.text: If you desire a high quality, sturdy, feels good to hold spoon for your drinks like Iced Tea in a tall glass then this is what you should get. Very high quality!!!! I love these and so does my wife!!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Long
customer_reviews.text: We moved and sold our home completely furnished, yes even the silverware. I use a long handled "tea" spoon for almost everything. However we discovered most retail sources don't stock such a spoon. I Googled and found these. Great clean design with a good sturdy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Designsmith

customer_reviews.title: Bea-u-TEA- ful!
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely and perform exactly as they are supposed to do. They are very sturdy. I also ordered a different set (I use a lot of these). They were delicate-looking. I believe I could bend one (with my fingers, not my mind). Even though this set of spoons is a couple of dollars more, from what I've seen, they are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic baby spoons!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced coated metal spoons with these plain metal spoons and we couldn't be more satisfied. The lip of the spoon is completely rounded. They aren't sharp at all and they hold more food for fewer bites. Very nice product. I would highly recomend these for any new parent starting baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Meisha A

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my fiancé’s coffee. The spoons we have never fit down to the bottom of his yeti leaving a sugar ring. They also fit great at the bottom of my Starbucks venti cups. They’re really good quality and no issues in the dishwasher either.
customer_reviews.author: Brookenicoleb

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, square edge instead of smooth tapered end
customer_reviews.text: The part of the spoon that goes in one’s mouth hasn’t been tapered, so it has a square, almost sharp edge to it. I had another set of these spoons i am comparing this product to, and they are much more comfortable to eat from as they have a smoothed edge.
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy desert spoon
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical until I received them. The spoons seem to be very sturdy as a desert spoon. Because of their length, I wouldn’t try scooping ice cream from a container, might bend but as a dessert spoon they fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: LUIZ DIAZ JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy glossy and heavy spoons. If you buy them you will be happy with them. It is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: KoFi

customer_reviews.title: Well made spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice long handled teaspoons. The gauge is just right. We have been using our set for a while now with no hint of staining, rusting or bending. They work great with our large Yeti style stainless steel tumblers. I would buy them again and might get another set just to have a few extra.
customer_reviews.author: MarkS

customer_reviews.title: Super glossy finish, and unexpectedly heavy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting such nice heavy quality, or such a glossy finish. Very attractive and they feel great in your hand. I checked over each carefully wary of sharp edges and found none at all, nothing to cut a lip or tongue in other words. Wonderful spoons!
customer_reviews.author: curious

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for every day use. The spoons have a classic design. They look lovely and the feel and finish is excellent. So far the stand up to lots of use and clean up nicely in the dishwasher. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn

customer_reviews.title: You will love these spoons
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the weight of these spoons. I searched many stores for iced tea spoons (for my iced coffee) and couldn't find any unless it was at a thrift store. You can use them for anything that a long handled spoon is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight to spoons
customer_reviews.text: Each spoon came wrapped in its own little packet so there would be no damage during shipping or storing. Appreciated that touch. These are definitely better than the ones I already had. Washes nicely in the dishwasher and looks good on our table.
customer_reviews.author: missannie1686

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, sturdy. Also came very nicely packaged - not only in a cardboard box, but wrapped as a group in plstic, and even individually wrapped - very nice. Would definitely deal with again, if I had the need, and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K.

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these teaspoons. They have a simple, modern, elegant style and look more expensive than they cost. They have a comfortable heft and balance and I enjoy using them for iced teas or milk shakes or for getting the last glob was f mayonnaise from the jar. I plan to order at least one more set.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile1963

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a guy with large hands
customer_reviews.text: 3rd set I bought and this one is perfect Nice smooth heavy little spoon I have big hands so for whatever reason other brands of this type of spoon feel weird in my hand Not these ...
customer_reviews.author: rexwen2000

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very sturdy. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, sturdy iced teaspoons that look and feel much more expensive than their actual cost. In fact, they look so expensive I have to buy new iced tea glasses to match the spoons!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for. Very well made, and they look and feel like sterling silver. If fact, a friend was looking for the sterling silver stamp! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: John-Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great price
customer_reviews.text: They came exactly as described and they have a great weight to them. People also assume they were really expensive stirring spoons from some place like Williams Sonoma so I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: High quality L
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent long tea spoons made of high quality stainless steel. They are a heavy weight and I expect them to last for a long time. I recommend them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: MattieLuna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy spoons. Bowl part of spoon is the size I expected from this type of spoon. Holds a tsp. of water if that helps.Had one for years and it disappeared so now I have six! Great for icecream, tall glasses, peanut butter, etc. Thirteen dollars but they should last forever. Five year old thinks they are super cool. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Buy These Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are the spoons to get if you need long handled iced tea spoons. They are not thin, stamped steel but sturdy three dimensional spoons with a nice heft.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, only 4 stars because handle ends too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons, very sturdy and quality made, but the handles to narrow, can slip through the siverware basket on my dishwasher, if at just the right angle.
customer_reviews.author: Christian48

customer_reviews.title: Simple, un-ornamented, and substantial in weight
customer_reviews.text: The ice tea spoons have a very simple and un-ornamented design. They are substantial in weight. It will take time to determine durability, but they appear to have lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona J

customer_reviews.title: Small spoon, handle feels like an unbalanced twig
customer_reviews.text: Expected a regular teaspoon with a long handle. It's the size of a baby spoon and the handle isn't balanced well and it's too rounded to handle comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: they match my current stainless ware. Except mine have wear. I may have to replace my current set with new to match my ice tea spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tall spoons
customer_reviews.text: I use them for stirring powdered drink mixes. They're tall enough to use with a tall travel mug. There's plenty of handle to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Coons

customer_reviews.title: Bar Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spoon to add to the bar. They are used and mush appreciated at the bar. I like the size and weight of the spoon. They are also nice quality and a good finish.
customer_reviews.author: C. Buflod

customer_reviews.title: Very small for a tea spoon
customer_reviews.text: For the price are Very small for a tea spoon
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect a lot for what these cost. Very sturdy spoons. Would be hard to bend them. Finish is great. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Long, strong, and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in design, these spoons are a great length for Tervis-type tea glasses. They feel strong and substantial in hand and are sturdy enough to resist the bending that so often afflicts long spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W Murdock

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN DO BETTER ELSEWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I HAD SOME OTHERS I GAVE AWAY BOUGHT THESE TO REPLACE, THEY ARE OK, BUT NOT LIKE THE ONES I HAD. nOT HEAVY ENOUGH STAINLLESS STEAL, ON THE LIGHT SIDE!
customer_reviews.author: MYRTLE ROBBINS

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace cheap ones that I hate because they bend. These are great. They are much thicker and longer than my other ones. They are very well made and durable. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, will match most stainless patterns
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for iced drinks and ice cream sodas. They are a nice weight and will match both sets of my stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: As expected. Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Decent quality, as with most of these items coming from overseas a lot of unnecessary plastic packaging is involved.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these long handled spoons. They are good looking, well made and come in handy. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Tea Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality is excellent. I knew they were nine inches, but I didn't realize how long that is. They are fine however.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small mouth and struggle finding a spoon that makes it easier to me to eat. These spoons are perfect. Well made. Durable! Great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Long Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I like the spoons, they are long enough to use in my tall cup. Now I don't burn my fingers when i drink hot tea.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Moulder

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. They work really well. The actual spoon part is small but gets the job done. Cleans really easy. Shiny and I love the quality of them
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Arbulu Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the little bit extra
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper sets but these DEALIGHT spoons are worth the little bit extra. They're really sturdy, stylish, and go thru the dishwasher with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: rabidpen

customer_reviews.title: not good, not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I can compare to 1 that I had... spoon is too small
customer_reviews.author: debby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect long spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are useful for tall ice cream or ice cream drinks. Just like you would find in an old soda shop with those tall 14-oz malts. Very nice complement to our bar area.
customer_reviews.author: RCBinTN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these spoons
customer_reviews.text: My husband can't stop talking about them. Every time he picks one up for his iced tea, he says, "I really love these spoons!" Excellent quality; we highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are a good weight, sturdy and hold up nicely when washed in dishwasher. Very good value and quality for the money. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Nice heavy steel and very nice looking. Happy to have them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Akers

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: I used one at my sisters and fell in love with them. I ordered and arrived as promised. Smooth edges and sturdy. Great for malts and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Great ice tea spoon
customer_reviews.text: i love these ice tea spoons, i wanted something that was like my mom had. great love them
customer_reviews.author: handheld

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, high quality spoons with long handles for "soda shoppe" glasses. Nice angle at end of spoon for getting at that scoop of ice cream at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't try any other !
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon. You read my review and you fixed the problem. First set of ice tea spoons were awfully poorly made..they were 1 step above plastic. I'm a very happy customer NOW. Thanks, BOB.
customer_reviews.author: Lambo Bob

customer_reviews.title: great spoons  lovely stainless
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my daughter in law for xmas and she was thrilled Loves them vor iced tea and iced coffee
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So happy with them! They have a good weight and have a beautiful finish!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: A1 product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product which has been very good any application especially ice tea and ice cream sodas.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Endlessly useful
customer_reviews.text: Tall ice tea glasses, parfait glasses, mayonnaise jars, sour cream cartons, applesauce jars. Anything where if you used a regular spoon, you would want end up with a mess on your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Of course I haven’t had them very long so we will see if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: wanda schrimsher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teaspoon!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spoons. A quality spoon. I have had them since July, and no issues. Very sturdy. I highly recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Spoon Shaft is on the thin side for a Long Teaspoon.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are not as strong as my old tea spoons. They are nice, I would buy again if the spoon shaft was thinker and stronger...
customer_reviews.author: Hard Working American

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are good quality stainless steel. They come out of the dishwasher shiny, and they seem well balanced. Just what I needed. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T.

customer_reviews.title: Tea spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy spoons, great for floats or anything you want to stir!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Rich

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Have some heft to them no worry over bending even with being nice and long.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Climber

customer_reviews.title: Slender, elegant spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are elegant. I love using one in my tall coffee mug full of bulletproof coffee. Slender, perfect. Plan to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: amatonterias

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice product. Fit nicely in a 20oz. tumbler and they're well built.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tea spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons and use them so often, I bought a second set. They are prettier and sturdier than I expected. I like the design. It fits beautifully with different styles of flatware.
customer_reviews.author: dimsum

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described - very nicely made and boxed and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: cwb100

customer_reviews.title: Weighty spoons with a good feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking spoons. Too soon to really rate durability, but all good after 10 washes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen and Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. The only thing is there packaged in a six pack and I only needed eight so I had to buy two.
customer_reviews.author: GLC

customer_reviews.title: great spoons
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I got these, we big glasses in the summer and this work great for root beer floats.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be sorry you ordered this set🤗
customer_reviews.text: Great ice tea spoons. They look just like my Oneida silver ware
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: As good as Alessi but affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and elegant set, I bought these because they complement my Alessi set perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Leo is Salem,OR

customer_reviews.title: Great tea spoons
customer_reviews.text: These tea spoons are heavy stainless steel and are well made.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Not bendy crap.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality, sturdy spoons. Not junky at all
customer_reviews.author: Kellymn

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They are a good weight, look beautiful, and feel nice. Love the length.
customer_reviews.author: P. Buchner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice, shiny long handled iced tea spoons. No rough edges like cheaper cafeteria style...these are a good weight and made to last. Fine to put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Very nice long handled spoons
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking spoons, they feel very sturdy and appear to be long lived.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylene

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Nice spoons. They are a nice weight. They are a tad pricey but good quality so I guess that makes up for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and won’t bend when dipping in head ice cream. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons, very strong. I can dish scoops of ice cream out of the carton with these spoons with no worries about them bending! My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Theisen

customer_reviews.title: Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great! Well made and attractive. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Pod

product_meta.title: Long Handle Spoon, 9-inch Ice Tea Spoon, DEALIGHT Premium 18/10 Stainless Steel Iced Teaspoon for Mixing, Cocktail Stirring, Tea, Coffee, Milkshake, Cold Drink, Set of 6 (Heavy Duty)
feature_bullets: ✓ PREMIUM QUALITY: Our Long Handle Spoon Crafted from high-class 18/10 (304) Stainless Steel, Very Durable & Sturdy, Strong for scooping ice cream, frozen yogurt desserts, tall parfait sundae glasses, and Good Quality will Last for years.

✓ EXTRA LONG SPOONS: 220 mm ( about 9 inch ) for total length, perfect for most glasses and pitchers, Also used as ice cream spoons, ice teaspoons, coffee mixing spoons, cocktail stirring spoons. And Long enough for tall coffee mugs. Suitable for bar, home, party use.
✓ LIFE STYLE: Luxurious and Stylish Design with Ergonomic Feel, Superior Quality Mirror Finished Surface, Smooth Edge definitely no rough spot. Enjoy your Leisure times in this summer!
✓ SET OF 6: Total Length: 220mm / about 9 inch; Handle length: 180 mm / 7 inch, Weight: 1.6 oz/pcs (9.6 oz/6 pcs). Dishwasher - safe, easy to clean.
✓ What You Get: 6 Pack Iced Tea Spoon, Giftbox Packaging, perfect for your family or as a gift
